analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x8b163843e70c8deec03d5ebb1256e0148f14e35b.sol:
	Contract ChainPay has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x8b163843e70c8deec03d5ebb1256e0148f14e35b.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
empty in ERC223Token.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x8b163843e70c8deec03d5ebb1256e0148f14e35b.sol#255) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x8b163843e70c8deec03d5ebb1256e0148f14e35b.sol#233-234) is a local variable never initialiazed
